trans-unit.source: Provides the functionality that allows a common language runtime host to participate in the flow, or migration, of the execution context.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a funcionalidade que permite que um host de tempo de execução de linguagem comum participar do fluxo ou migração do contexto de execução.

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.AppDomainManager> has a reference to a HostExecutionContextManager in its <xref:System.AppDomainManager.HostExecutionContextManager%2A> property, then the common language runtime calls the manager every time a call to the <xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method occurs, to allow the host to participate in the flow of the execution context.
trans-unit.target: Se atual <xref:System.AppDomainManager>tem uma referência a um HostExecutionContextManager no seu <xref:System.AppDomainManager.HostExecutionContextManager%2A>propriedade e, em seguida, o common language runtime chama o Gerenciador de sempre que uma chamada para o <xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método ocorre, para permitir que o host participar de fluxo do contexto de execução.</xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.AppDomainManager.HostExecutionContextManager%2A> </xref:System.AppDomainManager>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Captures the host execution context from the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Captura o contexto de execução do host do thread atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> is created using a safe handle containing the `IUnknown` pointer for the host executing the current thread.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>é criado usando um identificador seguro que contém o `IUnknown` ponteiro para o host de execução do thread atual.</xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Threading.HostExecutionContext"></xref> object representing the host execution context of the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Threading.HostExecutionContext"> </xref> objeto que representa o contexto de execução do host do thread atual.

trans-unit.source: Restores the host execution context to its prior state.
trans-unit.target: Restaura o contexto de execução do host para seu estado anterior.

trans-unit.source: `previousState` must be the object returned by the <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: `previousState`deve ser o objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext%2A>método.</xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The previous context state to revert to.
trans-unit.target: O estado de contexto anteriores para reverter para.

trans-unit.source: previousState is .
trans-unit.target: previousStateis .

trans-unit.source: -or- previousState was not created on the current thread.
trans-unit.target: - ou - previousState não foi criado no thread atual.

trans-unit.source: -or- previousState is not the last state for the .
trans-unit.target: - ou - previousState não é o último estado para o .

trans-unit.source: Sets the current host execution context to the specified host execution context.
trans-unit.target: Define o contexto de execução atual do host para o contexto de execução do host especificado.

trans-unit.source: The SetHostExecutionContext method sets the host execution context for the current <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>.
trans-unit.target: O método SetHostExecutionContext define o contexto de execução do host atual <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>.</xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> that has been used as the argument to another SetHostExecutionContext method call cannot be passed in as the parameter for this method.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>que foi usado como argumento para outra chamada de método SetHostExecutionContext não pode ser passado como parâmetro para este método.</xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext.CreateCopy%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to create a copy of a <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> object and then use the copy to set the host execution context.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, use o <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext.CreateCopy%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para criar uma cópia de um <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>de objeto e, em seguida, usar a cópia para definir o contexto de execução do host.</xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> </xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext.CreateCopy%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.Revert%2A> method using the object returned by this method to restore the <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> to its previous state.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.Revert%2A>método usando o objeto retornado por este método para restaurar o <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>para seu estado anterior.</xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> </xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.Revert%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Threading.HostExecutionContext"></xref> to be set.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Threading.HostExecutionContext"> </xref> a ser definido.

trans-unit.source: An object for restoring the <xref href="System.Threading.HostExecutionContext"></xref> to its previous state.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto para restaurar o <xref href="System.Threading.HostExecutionContext"> </xref> para seu estado anterior.

trans-unit.source: hostExecutionContext was not acquired through a capture operation.
trans-unit.target: hostExecutionContextnão foi adquirido por meio de uma operação de captura.

trans-unit.source: -or- hostExecutionContext has been the argument to a previous SetHostExecutionContext method call.
trans-unit.target: - ou - hostExecutionContext tem sido o argumento para uma chamada de método SetHostExecutionContext anterior.
